a correspond between algol 60 and church s lambda notat
part i thi paper describ how some of the semant
of algol 60 can be formal by establish a correspond
between express of algol 60 and express in a modifi
form of church s l notat first a model for
comput languag and comput behavior is describ base on the
notion of function applic and function abstract but also have
analogu for imper languag featur then thi model is us
as an abstract object languag into which algol 60 is
map mani of algol 60 s featur emerg as particular
arrang of a small number of structur rule suggest new
classif and gener the correspond is first describ inform mainli
by illustr the second part of the paper give a
formal descript i e an abstract compil into the abstract
objct languag thi is itself present in a pure function
notat that is on us onli applic and abstract cacm
